title: CheapProFonts - Newsletter 08 Q4
content:
Welcome to our 4th newsletter! :)

In this newsletter we celebrate two big landmarks: there are now 50 fonts on the site, and it is our 1 year anniversary! :D  
That’s one new font reworked and released almost every week throughout 2008!

In this news release I present 12 fonts:  
- 2 from Derek Vogelpohl  
- 2 from Ray Larabie  
- 2 from Kevin King  
- 2 from Brian Kent  
- 1 from Nick Curtis  
- 1 from Ronna Penner  
- 2 from Jim Lyles - and they’re free! :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090814212335im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/CheapProFonts-NEWS-08-Q4_6537.gif)

I cannot promise too keep up this speed, but I’ll do my very best... ;)

CheapProFonts is dedicated to supplying high-quality OpenType and TrueType fonts for setting “foreign” languages (languages requiring more than the basic A-Z characters) for professional Mac and Windows users.  
Check our site for constant new releases, and see you in the next newsletter!

Roger S. Nelsson  
—  
 [http://www.CheapProFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090814212335/http:/www.cheapprofonts.com/ "http://www.CheapProFonts.com")  
High quality multilingual fonts at a low price - for professional (non-english) designers with a small budget!
author: Roger S. Nelsson
